statements: SELECT camera_id, timestamp, footage_url FROM camera_footage;
SELECT footage_url, camera_id, timestamp FROM camera_footage;
SELECT camera_id, footage_url FROM camera_footage WHERE timestamp > now();
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-15 12:00:00';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM camera_footage WHERE footage_url LIKE '%security%';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, footage_url FROM camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT camera_id FROM camera_footage WHERE footage_url LIKE '%security%';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM camera_footage WHERE camera_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT footage FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_lighting_automation ORDER BY lighting_mode;
SELECT lighting_id, timestamp, lighting_mode FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 2 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT lighting_id, timestamp, lighting_mode FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE lighting_mode = 'auto' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE footage IS NOT NULL AND timestamp < NOW();
SELECT * FROM security_camera_logging;
SELECT camera_id, event_type, timestamp FROM security_camera_logging;
SELECT timestamp, event_type, camera_id FROM security_camera_logging;
SELECT * FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE setting = 'auto';
SELECT light_id, timestamp FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_logging ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, event_type, timestamp FROM security_camera_logging WHERE camera_id = 5 AND event_type = 'Motion Detection' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT control_id, scenario, timestamp FROM surveillance_control WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY control_id;
SELECT light_id, setting, timestamp FROM smart_lighting_automation WHERE setting LIKE '%Brightness%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM surveillance_control UNION ALL SELECT * FROM smart_lighting_automation ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT footage_url, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, automation_id, log_description FROM surveillance_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT automation_id, start_time, end_time FROM synchronization_schedule WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, footage_url FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, footage_url FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT automation_id, lighting_action FROM lighting_automation WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT log_id, camera_id, automation_id, timestamp FROM surveillance_log WHERE log_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM synchronization_schedule WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY end_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp, camera_id FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT footage_id, footage_url FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 'CAM001' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_automation WHERE light_control = TRUE;
SELECT automation_id, automation_name FROM lighting_automation WHERE automation_schedule <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp, camera_id FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT automation_name, light_control FROM lighting_automation WHERE light_control = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, event_type FROM surveillance_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, camera_location, camera_type FROM cameras WHERE camera_type = 'Outdoor';
